TopicTitle: I just downloaded several plugins and have a question regarding career mode

Articles.Content:
so I am new to this forum, and new to modding ksp and I had a question. I was wondering how to make plugins like mechjeb and other similar plugins that require parts on the ship accessible in career mode. In particular I have an engineering plugin that I want to be able to use. the problem is that the parts aren't unlocked so I can't use the mods.

Edited February 2, 2014 by jab136
What mod are you trying to you using?
